card.name: Maria Modern Marvel
card.text: Indestructible, protection from non-artifact spells, abilities, and creatures. When Maria, Modern Marvel enters the battlefield or attacks, you may attach any number of modular enhancements to it without paying their equip costs.

card.name: Maria Astartian Mecha
card.text: +1 Add a loyalty counter to Maria, Astartian Mecha for each artifact you control. -6 Create one of six Maria’s Modular enhancements, which are Legendary Equipment tokens. -12 Create a legendary artifact creature token called Maria, Modern Marvel. Maria, Astartian Mecha can be your commander.

card.name: Raise and Train
card.text: Skip your untap and draw steps. If a creature you control would leave the battlefield, instead return it to the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter.

card.name: Arwyl Thomas
card.text: +2 Until the beginning of your next upkeep, non-land permanents you control with mana value 1 or less have indestructible and hexproof. -4 Choose a non-land permanent with mana value 1 or less on the battlefield. Until your next upkeep, all non-land permanents you control with mana value 1 become copies of that permanent. -8 Create a Legendary creature token called Thomas, Pretender that is a 1/1 human with mana value 1 and has “T: Counter target spell or ability” Arwyl Thomas can be your commander.

card.name: Thomas Pretender
card.text: Thomas, Pretender has mana value 1. T: Counter target spell or ability.

card.name: Zhumbo-Boyi Bihgol Wanderer
card.text: At the beginning of each player’s upkeep, put an exploration counter on a land that player controls. Then, that player gains control of and untaps all lands with exploration counters until end of turn.

card.name: Scoria Shadow Lurking
card.text: Flying, shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.) Chroma — Scoria’s power and toughness are equal to your devotion to black.

card.name: The Beast of Ghrazen-Tor
card.text: When The Beast of Ghrazen-Tor attacks, it gains indestructible until end of turn. 1W, T: Target creature cannot be blocked this turn. 1R, T: The Beast of Ghrazen-Tor deals 4 damage to any target. 1U, T: Reveal a card in your hand. Until your next turn, that card has flash. 1G, T: Target creature you control fights target creature you don’t control.

card.name: Hor
card.text: When Hor enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless it escaped. Whenever Hor enters the battlefield or attacks, destroy a creature, then you may draw a card. Escape 1WWBB (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)

card.name: Jumpy Snorter of Elmers Glue
card.text: If you can convince an opponent to let you activate this ability, roll a D100. If the roll is even or 69, you gain 420 life. Otherwise, you must get them a drink of their choice, or snort Elmer’s Glue ™

card.name: Sister Adley
card.text: Remember that Grizzly Bears is a 3/3? This priestess, who I assume just up and joined the clergy right out of highschool and took an oath of sobriety and abstinence, can apparently tag team herself to take down a bear. Probably just overpowered from that wicked looking headress she's wearing. No, you need flavor text.

card.name: Fabricated Nature
card.text: Vigilance When Fabricated Nature enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 Beast token for each time it has been cast form the command zone.

card.name: It That Lurks in the Deep
card.text: Islandwalk You may cast It That Lurks in the Deep or other creature cards exiled with it from exile. When It That Lurks in the Deep enters the battlefield, exile all other creatres until it leaves the battlefield. {U}, Sacrifice a land: You may put It That Lurks in the Deep from your hand or command zone into exile.

card.name: Elazar World Eater
card.text: Haste, trample Whenever Elazar, World Eater attacks, sacrifice any number of lands, Elementals you control get +1/+1 until end of turn for each land sacrificed this way.

card.name: Joutu Spell-Swallower
card.text: Undaunted Indestructible, flying Whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell that targets only a single creature, copy that spell for each opponent. Those copies target Joutu, Spell-Swallower

card.name: Gort the Lonely
card.text: {1}, {T}: Gort, the Lonely deals 1 damage to you. If a source you control deals damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1, you win the game.

card.name: Elmon the Envious
card.text: Menace At the beginning of your end step, put a corruption counter on another target creature that doesn't have a corruption counter on it. Creatures with corruption counters on them are lands with"{T}:Add one mana of any type a land you control could produce."

card.name: Ankou Merciless Reaper
card.text: Ankou, Merciless Reaper enters the battlefield with a number of loyalty ounters equal to your starting life total minus your life total. Ankou, Merciless Reaper can be your commander. -X:Each player mills X and loses X life. -11: Return target creature from a graveyard to the battlefield, it gains haste. -31: Create The End, a black legendary enchantment with Vanishing 3 and "When this permanent leaves the battlefield, choose a player, that player loses the game."

card.name: Herald of Intenet
card.text: Flying Whenever Herald of Intent attacks, search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Shimuari Dragon Soul
card.text: +3:Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on the bottom of your library. +1:For each opponent, up to two target creatures they control get -2/-0 until your next turn. -12: You get an emblem with, "Whenever you draw a card, return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand." Then draw a card for each opponent. Creatures that attack Shimuari cannot be blocked. Shimuari, Dragon Soul can be your commander.

card.name: Captain Ronwell
card.text: Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are placed on Captain Ronwell, create that many 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens. This ability can only trigger once per turn.
